title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing meOne of the most disturbing visions that can haunt its ownerInterpretation of a dream about a snake chasing meA snake is one of the things that causes panic and anxiety in the dreamer when seeing it in a dream, because seeing it is linked to evil, enemies, and problems.Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin, through what he will present The site is different for our valued customers. We will learn about the different interpretations of catching a snake in a dream, the most important of which are: Among the interpretations of Ibn Sirin, he says that if a person sees in a dream that there are many small snakes chasing him and these snakes entered his house, then this vision indicates that this person is surrounded by a large number of enemies. Vision A person saw in a dream that he was killing a snake and that the snake was chasing him in his bed, so this vision indicates the death of his wife. When a man saw in his dream that he was entering a snake or a snake into his house alone, his vision was an indication that this dreamer has an enemy very close to him, but he does not know Who is he? When a sick person sees in his dream that there is a snake that wants to chase him and this snake has left his home, the vision is an indication that the dreamer is suffering from many problems, worries and difficulties, and this vision can also indicate that his death is approaching. The person who sees in a dream a snake chasing him This person is not afraid of him, as this vision shows that the dreamer is a strong personality and the vision also shows that the dreamer will receive huge sums of money from the Sultan. Seeing a person raising snakes in his home and not being afraid of them, this vision is considered a praiseworthy vision and an indication that the dreamer will gain a wonderful place among the people. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about catching a snake in a dream for a married woman and a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees a white snake in a dream, this vision was an indication that this girl will be approached by an evil person, and if a weak person does not harm her, this indicates However, God will save her from this person and want her. Save her from him. A girl sees in her dream that she overtakes a black snake until she dies. This vision indicates that this girl will face a big problem, but soon she will get rid of it, and God will save her from it. Small snakes in a solitary girl’s dream indicate that there are several weak enemies, but These enemies cannot harm her, and whoever has enmity or hatred, this enmity will be between friends or relatives. When an unmarried girl sees a black snake in her dream, this vision indicates envy, or the vision could be a sign of negative and bad thoughts surrounding her When seeing a yellow snake, this is a sign of bad luck in this girl’s life or an indication that this girl is connected to an immoral person and caution must be exercised. Chasing a snake in a single girl’s dream is evidence that this girl will go through a serious crisis and this crisis may be with her family or Her neighbors or friends. If a girl dreams that a black snake is chasing her, this vision indicates that this girl is suffering from tension and conflicting thoughts and that an evil person is trying to ensnare her.

title: Interpretation of seeing bruises on the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bruises on the face by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as there are many reasons for the appearance of bruises on the face. Such as a strong blow or severe bruises. We will talk about the interpretation of this vision for an unmarried girl, a married woman, pregnant women, men, and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing bruises on Ibn Sirin’s face? Seeing bruises on Ibn Sirin’s face is an indication of the severity of the illness and the psychological pain of the pioneer. Seeing bruises appearing on the face is an indication of corruption. The dreamer’s morals and his many sins and disobedience and the spread of heresies among people, or an indication of many worries and pain in his life if the bruises appear black or blue. See also: Interpretation of seeing red bruises in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing bruises on the face in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl She has bruises on her face in a dream. This indicates her repeated mistakes and her failure to make any decision in her life, and in the case of melasma or freckles on the face, it shows her determination to make wrong decisions and ruin her life. What is the interpretation of seeing melasma or brown freckles on the face of an unmarried girl: Seeing a girl A single woman seeing the appearance of melasma or brown freckles on her face in a dream is a sign that she will suffer from many problems and stresses in her life. Seeing a single woman getting rid of melasma or freckles having surgery in a dream is a sign of the collapse of her worries and sorrows from her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing blue bruises in a dream. What is its interpretation? A married woman who sees freckles or melasma in a dream: A married woman seeing freckles or melasma appearing on her face in a dream is a sign of her wrong behavior and many problems and issues in her life. A married woman seeing freckles appearing on her face in a dream indicates disturbances and gossip to others. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees freckles or melasma in a dream? Melasma in a dream: A pregnant woman seeing the appearance of freckles or melasma in a dream indicates enjoying better health, well-being, and the strength of her beauty, and indicates either good children or a lot of money. A pregnant woman seeing freckles appearing on her arm or hands is one of the good visions in bestowing goodness and abundant livelihood. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream What is the interpretation of a man who sees freckles or freckles on his face in a dream: A man seeing freckles or melasma appearing on his face and his dream is evidence of his many sins and mistakes, God’s wrath upon him, and loss of confidence in himself and others. Seeing a man removing spots from his face. The doctor has an idea about His bright future and the achievement of all his goals and dreams. See also: The interpretation of seeing a clear face in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing blue bruises in a dream: Seeing blue bruises in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is fascinated by the people closest to him and is completely destroying his life. Seeing blue bruises in a dream is an indication of the large number of enemies in his life and the necessity of... Pay attention to them and fortify oneself with legitimate rukia. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wound on the face in a dream Interpretation of seeing bruises in the eyes in a dream: Seeing bruised eyes in a dream is an indication of intense sadness and pain.

title: Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a single woman seeing red in her dream? Statement of the history of her marriage to a good man. What does a dream mean that he is wearing red clothes? Evidence that she has some problems, but they will disappear quickly. What is the meaning of seeing a married woman wearing red curtains? Evidence that you earn a lot of money in Within a few days. What is the interpretation of seeing a married man in red? It indicates the birth of good offspring, God willing. What does it mean to see yourself eating red food? It indicates a great deal of thinking about a topic that occupies one’s mind. What is the interpretation of seeing the color red in a patient’s dream? Unpleasant? It does not bode well for its owner. What does the vision in which the name is written in bold and red font mean? Evidence of pride among people. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees the color red in her dream, this means that the date of her marriage to a righteous man is approaching, God willing. When a pregnant woman sees the color red during pregnancy, this indicates the need to take care of her health and the health of her fetus. However, if a man sees himself wearing a red shirt during his sleep, this indicates that he does not know the results of the experiences he is going through. While seeing red curtains in a married woman’s dream symbolizes... Earning a lot of money in a few days. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a red veil, this is evidence that she will live a happy life soon. Red color in a dream for a man. If a single person sees that he is buying expensive furniture for his room, and its color is red, this means that he is facing a major crisis. When he sees himself wearing red clothes in his dream, it is evidence that he will be exposed to some problems, but they will disappear quickly. However, if he sees that he is wearing a beautifully designed suit of red color in the dream, this is a sign that he is almost weak before him, God willing. While seeing red food in the dream symbolizes thinking. A lot about an issue that occupies a person’s mind. If a person dreams that he is driving a red car, this means that he has committed many sins. The red color of a sick person in a dream. If a sick person sees in his dream that he is wearing a red dress, this indicates the deterioration of his health in the coming days. But if the dreamer sees The color red in the dream and he was sick, this is a sign that his time is approaching. Ibn Sirin sees this. Seeing the color red in a sick person’s dream is not pleasant, and does not bode well for its owner. While seeing the color red in a sick person’s dream indicates a quick recovery, God willing, and an improvement in his health condition. Seeing clothes The red color of a sick fortune teller in a dream warns him that something bad will happen, because it may indicate death. The red color of the dead in a dream. Seeing the dead wearing red clothes in a dream indicates his martyrdom in the afterlife and his lack of comfort. When the sleeper sees that his deceased father appears in his dream, wearing a red dress, a message To the dreamer that he must believe in the spirit of his father. This vision may also indicate in the dream that the deceased has committed bad deeds in his life and that the dreamer must comfort him after his death with zakat and prayers for him. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her deceased mother is wearing red clothes, then this

title: Interpretation of a dream in the name of a specific person for senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific person: Seeing the name of a known or unknown person in a dream has many repercussions depending on the person’s marital status, whether he is married, single, divorced, or widowed, so we will list all the interpretations in detail today on the website Various in the article Dream Interpretation Name A specific person. Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific person in a dream: The dream interpretation indicates the name of a specific person in the dream, and you know the name in the dream, in an event that will appear before you and you will recognize it. Seeing a person marrying a woman he knows means that he will receive a lot of good news in life. Seeing Someone you know dying in a dream means misfortune. Seeing a specific man in a dream shows the dreamer’s relationship with that man. Seeing someone doing bad things in a dream means that many problems will appear in the present and future. Interpretation of a dream about a specific person’s name in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says Seeing a man in a dream is a sign that something is being hidden from you. If one sees that he is marrying the owner of the name in a dream, this is a sign of happy news that he will receive soon. Seeing a friend’s name in a dream is a sign of good luck in business or life in general. The dream With a specific person in a dream is a sign of social and family connection to that person. Seeing a specific person doing something bad is a sign of many problems and sorrows. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Abdullah in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: The name Abdullah in a dream is a sign of contemplation, worship, and closeness. From God Almighty. Seeing the name Abdullah in a dream indicates the good and beautiful qualities of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the name Abdullah in a dream for a single girl is a sign of her good morals. Interpretation of a dream with the name of a specific person, such as the name Abdullah in a dream for an unmarried woman, is evidence of her marriage to A good man. Interpretation of seeing the name Saud in a dream: The meaning of the name Saud in a dream is a sign of a lot of goodness for this person. Saud in a dream shows the happy news that he will receive. The name Saud in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams for the dreamer. If an unmarried girl sees the name Saud in a dream This is evidence of optimism and happiness in her life. Interpretation of a dream with the name Saud for a married woman: The name Saud in a dream means happiness and good news. Interpretation of a dream with the name Saud for a married woman, this indicates the happy news that she will receive. Seeing a married woman named Saud in a dream means success and the fulfillment of dreams. Name Saud for a married woman indicates sustenance and bliss. Interpretation of seeing the name Aya in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the name Aya in a dream is a sign of good news and a warning from God Almighty. Seeing the name Aya in a dream indicates the dreamer’s mercy, provided that his behavior is good and he approaches God Almighty. Dreaming of the name Aya in a dream is good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the name Aya in a dream is a sign from God Almighty to stay away from Satan. Interpretation of a dream with the name Saud for a married woman indicates the happy news that she will receive. Seeing a married woman named Saud in a dream means success and achieving dreams. The name Saud for a married woman indicates sustenance and bliss. Seeing the name Aya in a dream indicates the dreamer’s mercy, provided that his behavior is good and he draws closer to God Almighty. Dreaming of the name Aya in a dream is good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the name Aya in a dream is a sign from God Almighty to stay away from Satan. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing cold and snow in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cold and snow in a dream. Some people prefer the atmosphere that accompanies the winter season, such as cold and snow, and it makes them feel happy and cheerful, while a group of people become depressed because of the extreme cold. Seeing cold and snow in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing cold and snow in a dream? Interpretations related to seeing cold and snow in a dream vary between Good and evil. Some commentators say that snow is a sign of the disappearance of worries and the enjoyment of peace and psychological comfort. Snow indicates good psychology and kindness of the dreamer and adds a lot of good morals to him, and therefore it is said that it is a blessing to whoever sees it. If one feels very cold in a dream, and is covered with snow In abundance, this indicates the injustice that he suffers in his normal life from some people who have great power and slander him. But if the snow covers the houses and does not harm the people, then this indicates the descending of sustenance on the people of that house and the increase of blessing on their children and their lives. It is possible that the vision of hail is Snow inside a house is one of the unpleasant dreams for a person, as it explains the pain and sadness that will befall the people of that house, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing cold and snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin explains that seeing cold and snow in a dream is not a good thing, as this indicates The presence of problems and difficult issues in the dreamer’s life, especially if this is severe cold and the snow is thick. It claims that the presence of snow spoils the crop and fruits, and as a result a person can become impoverished and cause illness to a person, so this is not considered a valid vision for its owner. Sometimes this vision brings great goodness and increase In blessing in life, according to what Ibn Sirin sees, he says that the presence of rain with snow is better because it indicates an increase in trade and the cultivation of workers. As for the heavy snow that causes destruction and death, as it falls on homes and makes people sick, it is of no benefit because it portends illness or failure. For the pioneer, and it may be evidence of a person traveling a long road that brings nothing but evil. Ibn Sirin explains that melting snow is one of the happy dreams for a person because it foretells to the dreamer that sorrows will end and such melting will go away. It indicates that excessive cold is not good, because it expresses People in general suffer from pressures and difficulties such as high prices or worries and experiences. Seeing cold and snow in a single woman’s dream. Feeling very cold in a dream may not be beneficial for a single woman, because it indicates a delay in some things that they want in reality and their inability to get them in time. Current. If she seeks to travel to fulfill a desire and sees cold in her dream, some commentators say that this trip will not give her what she desires and she will not gain anything from it. As for the extreme cold that reaches the wind, it is evidence of her lack of livelihood and her distress, in addition to the bad days that she suffers from. Loss of money. Seeing snow is the opposite of cold because it shows the peace of mind that she will enjoy in addition to the stability of the turbulent issues in her life, such as her relationship with her family or friends, as well as

title: Interpretation of a dream about one tooth falling out in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about one tooth falling out in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about one tooth falling out in a dream is not promising, according to what Ibn Sirin said in his book on the interpretation of dreams, and each tooth in the mouth has its own interpretation, and therefore these interpretations will be explained in detail in the following lines. You have a dream that confuses you. Waiting for him... Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about one tooth falling out in a dream. Imam Al-Sadiq said: Seeing teeth falling out is a bad thing, and indicates harm to the dreamer’s family or home, according to the order of age that occurred in the dream. Imam Al-Sadiq also indicated that teeth in a dream indicate On food, and if it falls from the dreamer’s mouth, this is a sign that he lives in a state of financial imbalance and poverty, as well as a lack of livelihood. Which he had. Before. Ibn Sirin said: If the dreamer sees one of the upper jaw teeth falling out in the dream, it symbolizes the death of the uncle, cousin, or any male relative of the father. And if the dreamer sees all the upper jaw teeth falling out in the dream, this indicates the death of all his relatives on the part of His father, and God will give him a longer life than everyone else. When the dreamer sees that the upper dog of his mouth fell in a dream, the dream indicates a serious disaster or illness that befalls the father, and he may die because of it, and if the father actually died, the interpretation of the dream belongs to the eldest in the family He also dies, or suffers a severe crisis in his money. He puts his life in danger due to the severity of the shock. Imam Al-Sadiq also said, or if a single tooth falls into the dreamer’s hands, and he rejoices if he sees this thing, then it is the profit he will obtain soon. As for the tooth falling from the dreamer’s mouth and extreme sadness for it in the vision, it is a sign of the victory of competitors. And they lost a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. As for Ibn Sirin, he said: Teeth falling out in a dream indicates the death of a relative and the sadness that resides in the dreamer’s house due to the separation of one of his relatives. He said: If the upper jaw of the tooth falls out, the fortuneteller may quarrel with him. One of his male relatives and separating his relationship with him. If the fortuneteller pulls out a tooth with his hand, this is a sign that he is taking part of his money to spend on someone or bearing financial responsibility in an important family matter, and he is doing so against his will. And if the dreamer causes a tooth to fall out by pressing it hard with his tongue , this is interpreted as bad words for his family members and will cause them trouble soon. When a married man dreams of a tooth falling out of his mouth while in his clothes, he will become a father and God will give him a male son. If the smell of the tooth that fell out of his mouth is foul or rotten, and he sees another tooth that is clean and looks beautiful And it appeared in the same place as the tooth that was removed, these are new developments and positive events for the dreamer living inside. His life changes, and he becomes one of the people of money, and he becomes one of the people of great social and economic levels. Interpretation of dreams of only one tooth falling out for a single woman. If the dreamer quarrels with someone from her family and the relationship between them has ended a long time ago and she sees in her dream a tooth falling out in the palm of her hand, then she is thinking about reconciliation with This person and soon social relations between them are renewed

title: Interpretation of dreams when I see someone I know in our house

preview.html: If the unmarried dreamer indicates the approaching marriage of a person whom she greatly desires, and if the dreamer is married, then this indicates that someone close to her will return from traveling soon. Interpretation of seeing someone I know in our house in a dream for a single girl. When the single girl saw a vision of someone she knows in her home, she became angry. She screamed loudly. She says that she is living in some big problems at this time in her life and it is not over yet. She also says that she feels very afraid of the crises that she is going through in her life, and God knows best. The dream interprets that she is living in tension in her life from some people who enter it. An unmarried woman who sees someone she knows enters her home and rejoices in his presence. It shows that he will live in a great love relationship with this person he saw. It also explains the meaning that she thinks a lot about this person and the next life with him. An unmarried girl who sees the dream is only a sign of The good that will come to her if she looks beautiful. And if it looks bad, it shows something bad or a failure that will happen in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding at homeInterpretation of seeing someone I know in our house in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that someone she knows has entered her house In the dream. It announces that the coming good and happy things will come to her and she will hear the good news of her life. The dream also indicates the great generosity that she extends to the guests who enter her house. The dream is nothing but the great kindness that she extends to those who are close to her and her relationship with her life. If the person who entered her house is bad looking And his appearance was very bad in the dream. This means that she falls into crises that do not end easily and make her very sad in her life. If she chases him away in a dream while she is happy, this indicates that she will get rid of the crises soon. And that she will live a calm and problem-free life with her husband, with her husband’s permission. God. The dream is interpreted for those who will come to her house in the coming period of this period, God willing. Interpretation of seeing someone I know in our house in a dream about a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman sees someone she knows in her house and rejoices in his presence. It indicates that the groom will propose to her very soon, and she will accept him. And she will marry him, God willing. The dream shows the happy things that this divorced woman will find in her life. She will end her many problems with her ex-husband, God willing. What if the person she knows in the dream enters her house and she refuses to meet him in the dream. Here it shows that she will refuse to get close to some people in her life because Her sadness for them. As evidenced by seeing her ex-divorce inside her house, and he was laughing, and talking to her a lot in the dream. This is a sign that she will return to him in the near future, and she will be very happy with him. The dream also shows the idea of ​​her divorce and that she would like to talk to him again. Interpretation of the vision A person I know in our house in a dream about a man and its meaning When the dreamer saw a person in his house, he had known him before and was happy to see him. The meaning indicates the great friendship that this person lives in, with this person in his life. And he gives him great value and status in his life in this Time is very fearful

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream: Interpretation of where you will see other fugitives

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream Interpretation of where Sirin and others fleeing, many are afraid of predatory animals, reptiles, other birds, and predatory animals, and it is rare to find people with a strong heart that prevents them from being afraid of the snake, because the snake is a frightening, poisonous, and deadly reptile, and seeing it in a dream is one of the things that It makes fear, terror, and panic enter the heart and life of God. Therefore, in this article, we will learn together today about the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream, and the interpretation of the place where you will see other fugitives.Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most important dream interpreters. He talked about seeing a snake in a dream and gave the following interpretations: Seeing a snake in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy near the dreamer, and seeing a snake entering the house indicates the presence of an enemy for the dreamer among his relatives, and he must be careful. Snakes entering the dreamer’s house and leaving in abundance indicate worries, problems, and serious problems that will arise. He suffers from it, and if the dreamer is sick, then it is a bad omen, God forbid. The snake indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life, and the degree of his evil is measured by the size of the snake and the intensity of its venom. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream according to a number of interpreters. Below are the most prominent interpretations of seeing a snake according to interpretation scholars. Dreams: Imam Ibn Shaheen says: Whoever sees in a dream that he was killed by a snake, then he will rejoice in victory over enemies in reality, victory over them in hadith, and acquisition of their money. In the event that you see a snake made of gold, metal, or silver, then this dream is big news, because it indicates The great money and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a smooth snake in a dream means that the dreamer will gain a lot of money or a prominent position, as God Almighty said to his Prophet Moses in Surat Taha verse (He said: Take it and do not be afraid). It indicates The dreamer’s success in catching a snake indicates that the dreamer has reached a position or position in real life. In Al-Zuhairi’s interpretation, whoever sees a snake biting him will be harmed by an enemy hiding inside him intending to harm him. He indicated in Al-Kirmani’s interpretation that whoever sees a snake coming out of his mouth or nose. In his dream, it indicates that someone close to him will harm him and become his enemy. The snake speaks to the dreamer about the appearance of happiness, goodness, and happiness for him and his family. He held in your hand the snake that was running on the ground safely and securely after great fear, as God Almighty said (Take it and do not be afraid). It was mentioned in the Imam’s narration. Jaafar Al-Sadiq that seeing a snake or viper means damage to the reputation and prestige of a married woman’s life in happiness and stability. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream: The scholar Ibn Sirin says, as dream interpretation scholars have unanimously agreed, that the large snake symbolizes a major problem that the dreamer will fall into in the coming days of his life, Its severity is determined by the size of the snake. Interpretation of seeing small snakes in a dream: The emergence of a small snake from the dreamer is good news that God will grant him offspring in the coming season. Small snakes that come out of the dreamer’s pocket are a sign of losing money. Interpretation of seeing a snake

Snakes entering the dreamer’s house and leaving in abundance indicate worries, problems, and serious problems that will arise. He suffers from it, and if the dreamer is sick, then it is a bad omen, God forbid. The snake indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life, and the degree of his evil is measured by the size of the snake and the intensity of its venom. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream according to a number of interpreters. Below are the most prominent interpretations of seeing a snake according to interpretation scholars. Dreams: Imam Ibn Shaheen says: Whoever sees in a dream that he was killed by a snake, then he will rejoice in victory over enemies in reality, victory over them in hadith, and acquisition of their money. In the event that you see a snake made of gold, metal, or silver, then this dream is big news, because it indicates The great money and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a smooth snake in a dream means that the dreamer will gain a lot of money or a prominent position, as God Almighty said to his Prophet Moses in Surat Taha verse (He said: Take it and do not be afraid). It indicates The dreamer’s success in catching a snake indicates that the dreamer has reached a position or position in real life. In Al-Zuhairi’s interpretation, whoever sees a snake biting him will be harmed by an enemy hiding inside him intending to harm him. He indicated in Al-Kirmani’s interpretation that whoever sees a snake coming out of his mouth or nose. In his dream, it indicates that someone close to him will harm him and become his enemy. The snake speaks to the dreamer about the appearance of happiness, goodness, and happiness for him and his family. He held in your hand the snake that was running on the ground safely and securely after great fear, as God Almighty said (Take it and do not be afraid). It was mentioned in the Imam’s narration. Jaafar Al-Sadiq that seeing a snake or viper means damage to the reputation and prestige of a married woman’s life in happiness and stability. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream: The scholar Ibn Sirin says, as dream interpretation scholars have unanimously agreed, that the large snake symbolizes a major problem that the dreamer will fall into in the coming days of his life, Its severity is determined by the size of the snake. Interpretation of seeing small snakes in a dream: The emergence of a small snake from the dreamer is good news that God will grant him offspring in the coming season. Small snakes that come out of the dreamer’s pocket are a sign of losing money. Interpretation of seeing a snake
